api

Interface Scheduler<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - Type of result to be produced
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RamseyScheduler, SchedulerDefault

    public interface Scheduler<R>
extends Serializable
    Defines a scheduler that runs on the Space A Scheduler handles the assignment of tasks to PRoxies. Scheduler may have a custom method for processing results
    Author:
    Michael Nekrasov, Roman Kazarin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processResult(Result<R> result)
      Process the result recieved by Proxy and take apropriate action
      void rescheduleTasks(Collection<Task<R>> leftoverTasks)
      Called by proxy when a computer disconnects to reschedule tasks
      void setJob(Task<R> task)
      Sets the initial task to the scheduler This task will point to the final solution in the space
      void start(SharedState initialState, Map<Integer,Proxy<R>> proxies, BlockingQueue<Result<R>> solutions, BlockingQueue<Exception> exceptions)
      Start the scheduler on the space WARNING: Should not be blocking, start any blocking process in new thread
      String statusString()
      Gets a status string that explains the progress of this Scheduler
      void stop()
      Stops the space WARNING: Should not be blocking, start any blocking process in new thread
      void updateState(SharedState state)
      Called by Space when the state has been updated, can be used by scheduler to take action

    • Method Detail

      • setJob

        void setJob(Task<R> task)
        Sets the initial task to the scheduler This task will point to the final solution in the space
        Parameters:
        task - to start job with

      • processResult

        void processResult(Result<R> result)
        Process the result recieved by Proxy and take apropriate action
        Parameters:
        result - to process

      • rescheduleTasks

        void rescheduleTasks(Collection<Task<R>> leftoverTasks)
        Called by proxy when a computer disconnects to reschedule tasks
        Parameters:
        leftoverTasks - to reschedule

      • statusString

        String statusString()
        Gets a status string that explains the progress of this Scheduler
        Returns:
        the status string

      • updateState

        void updateState(SharedState state)
        Called by Space when the state has been updated, can be used by scheduler to take action
        Parameters:
        state - new state

      • start

        void start(SharedState initialState,
         Map<Integer,Proxy<R>> proxies,
         BlockingQueue<Result<R>> solutions,
         BlockingQueue<Exception> exceptions)
        Start the scheduler on the space WARNING: Should not be blocking, start any blocking process in new thread
        Parameters:
        initialState - of the Space
        proxies - Pointer to proxies in Space, any modifications of objects carried to parent space
        solutions - Pointer to solutions in Space, any modifications of objects carried to parent space
        exceptions - Pointer to exceptions in Space, any modifications of objects carried to parent space

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the space WARNING: Should not be blocking, start any blocking process in new thread
